ipAddress.title: IP Address
ipAddress.description: IP Address of your MyLink.  This should be a static IP Address

systemID.title: System ID
systemID.description: In the myLink app, go to "Integration", choose one of the options that isn't Alexa or IFTTT, then choose "Change System ID".  Once set, choose "Get Integration report".

reverseAll.title: Reverse All Channels
reverseAll.description: If your shades are all moving in the wrong direction, check this option.  If only some are backwards, specify the individual channel ids below instead.

reverseChannels.title: Reverse Channel IDs
reverseChannels.description: Use this section if you need to reverse some, but not all, of your shades

items.description: Enter the channel number (1 - 16), which can be found in the Edit -> RTS Programming Settings section of the MyLink app

hideChannels.title: Hide Channel IDs
hideChannels.description: Use this section if you want to prevent certain channels from showing in HomeKit

items.description: Enter the channel number (1 - 16), which can be found in the Edit -> RTS Programming Settings section of the MyLink app

channelRetryDelay.title: Channel Retry Delay
channelRetryDelay.description: How long (in seconds) to wait before attempting to retry fetching channel info on failure
